fields.Title of Presentation: Water Bug Rides the Bubble through the Flood: Tension and Power in the Field Training Context
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Oklahoma Workshop on Native American Languages
fields.Description/Abstract: Informed consent, as part of the ethical conduct of research with human "subjects" is a moving target in the context of linguistic field work. This paper reports on an example of the feared "worst case" scenario and how cross-cultural mishaps ultimately inform, and shape, the notion of "consent."
